title: Crew Show!
description: This week we got some hands-on time with the X-Box One (aka XBone) and Forza Motorsport 5 courtesy of our friens over at Turn 10 Studios.  Additionally we've just returned from the single largest vehicle shoot in /Drive's history.  We touch on the 911 Carrera S, C7 Corvette, Fiesta ST, BMW M5 and many more.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: This week we got some hands-on time with the X-Box One (aka XBone) and Forza Motorsport 5 courtesy of our friens over at Turn 10 Studios.  Additionally we've just returned from the single largest vehicle shoot in /Drive's history.  We touch on the 911 Carrera S, C7 Corvette, Fiesta ST, BMW M5 and many more.
